title: Ralph setup wizard and config-driven runtime (TDD)
description:
Create ralph-setup wizard that configures runtime (bash/bun), notifications, max iterations, model routing. All stored in config.json.

APPROACH: Test-Driven Development
1. Write unit tests for config validation FIRST
2. Write tests for wizard behavior FIRST
3. Then implement to make tests pass
4. Integration tests last

acceptanceCriteria.text: PHASE 1 - UNIT TESTS (write first, should fail initially)
Test: _ralph_load_config loads runtime field from config.json
Test: _ralph_load_config defaults runtime to 'bash' when not specified
Test: config.json runtime field accepts 'bash' or 'bun' values
Test: maxIterations is read from config.defaults.maxIterations
Add runtime field to config schema and TypeScript types
Extend _ralph_load_config to load RALPH_RUNTIME from config
ralph-config wizard saves all preferences to config.json
ralph command reads config.runtime to choose bash/bun UI
Test: Fresh config triggers wizard on first ralph run
Test: Config changes are respected without CLI flags
Run full test suite - all tests must pass
